headline: Why Coinbase (COIN) Stock Is Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) fell 2.2% in the afternoon session after the Federal Reserve cut its benchmark interest rate by a quarter-point, while signaling one rate cut in 2026 which was lower than expectations.

headline: Coinbase Joins Ethereum Foundation to Back Open Intents Framework

headline: Coinbase Data Breach: Insider Plot and Alleged Cover-Up Exposed
summary: A newly unsealed court filing has revealed the most detailed account yet of the massive data breach that struck Coinbase earlier this year, exposing more than 69,000 users and causing damages estimated at $400 million. headline: Coinbase Urges DOJ to Block Conflicting State Crypto Rules
